name: Asterisks (AntiClux)
description:
Asteroids, but Asterisks: a space shooter that's neither in space or a shooter.

An unholy amalgamation between Asteroids and Joust, made in under 3 hours in Godot for Trijam #214.

Poke the asterisks' core with the pointy thing to destroy them.

A / left key : rotate left

D / right key : rotate right

W / up key / space : thrust
